comments.body: As humans, we simply do not have a great capability of generating random passwords.Â  This is why you should also use a Password Generator.Â  It is also why you should not manually create a Bitcoin Wallet seed by manually picking the words yourself.Â  Also why Brain Wallets turned to a failure.Â  Human mind is not as random as you think.-Regards,PrivacyG
